sg.edu.nus.cs2020

Class QuestionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.cs2020.QuestionTreeBase
      • sg.edu.nus.cs2020.QuestionTree

  • public class QuestionTree
extends QuestionTreeBase
    This class extends QuestionTreeBase for students to implement the buildTree and findQuery methods.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTree

        public void buildTree(java.util.ArrayList<QuestionObject> objects)
        This method builds the tree of objects.
        Specified by:
        buildTree in class QuestionTreeBase
        Parameters:
        objects - an array of QuestionObjects

      • findQuery

        public Query findQuery()
        This method calculates the next question to ask in the game. It finds a node in the tree that has at least n/3 objects as descendants, and at most 2n/3 objects as descendants, where n is the total number of objects in the tree.
        Specified by:
        findQuery in class QuestionTreeBase
        Returns:
        the next query that will eliminate at least n/3 objects in the tree
